title: ServiceEntry
description: ServiceEntry is the Schema for the serviceentrys API

spec.description: Configuration affecting service registry. See more details at: https://istio.io/docs/reference/config/networking/service-entry.html

addresses.description: The virtual IP addresses associated with the service.

endpoints.description: One or more endpoints associated with the service.

address.description: Address associated with the network endpoint without the port.

labels.description: One or more labels associated with the endpoint.

locality.description: The locality associated with the endpoint.

network.description: Network enables Istio to group endpoints resident in the same L3 domain/network.

ports.description: Set of ports associated with the endpoint.

serviceAccount.description: The service account associated with the workload if a sidecar is present in the workload.

weight.description: The load balancing weight associated with the endpoint.

exportTo.description: A list of namespaces to which this service is exported.

hosts.description: The hosts associated with the ServiceEntry.

location.description:
Specify whether the service should be considered external to the mesh or part of the mesh.

Valid Options: MESH_EXTERNAL, MESH_INTERNAL

ports.description: The ports associated with the external service.

number.description: A valid non-negative integer port number.

protocol.description: The protocol exposed on the port.

targetPort.description: The port number on the endpoint where the traffic will be received.

resolution.description:
Service resolution mode for the hosts.

Valid Options: NONE, STATIC, DNS, DNS_ROUND_ROBIN

subjectAltNames.description: If specified, the proxy will verify that the server certificate's subject alternate name matches one of the specified values.

labels.description: One or more labels that indicate a specific set of pods/VMs on which the configuration should be applied.

conditions.description: Current service state of the resource.

lastProbeTime.description: Last time we probed the condition.

lastTransitionTime.description: Last time the condition transitioned from one status to another.

message.description: Human-readable message indicating details about last transition.

reason.description: Unique, one-word, CamelCase reason for the condition's last transition.

status.description: Status is the status of the condition.

type.description: Type is the type of the condition.

observedGeneration.description: Resource Generation to which the Reconciled Condition refers.

validationMessages.description: Includes any errors or warnings detected by Istio's analyzers.

documentationUrl.description: A url pointing to the Istio documentation for this specific error type.

level.description:
Represents how severe a message is.

Valid Options: UNKNOWN, ERROR, WARNING, INFO

code.description: A 7 character code matching `^IST[0-9]{4}$` intended to uniquely identify the message type.

name.description: A human-readable name for the message type.

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.
